title: Obby: Parkour Lava

thumbnailDetails.alt: Obby Parkour Lava Free Online Roblox Game

headings.text: How to Play Obby: Parkour Lava

controls: Move: WASDJump: SpacebarCamera: Mouse movementPause: Esc
Use the on-screen joystick to move your character.Swipe on the screen to adjust the camera for better navigation.
content.howToPlay: Run, jump and climb with precision to reach the checkpoints because lava is rising.If you fall into the lava, you need to start from the last checkpoint.Use WASD to move and spacebar to jump. Your goal is to collect coins scattered across the platforms.You can use your earnings to unlock skins in the shop and show off your style.A few of the available skins are Robbie, Stickman, Doge and Rainbow Friend.

fullContent: Homeâ€º RobloxObby: Parkour LavaBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenObby: Parkour Lava is an online fun platformer game. The main goal is to guide your avatar through the obby parkour. The platform is slowly sinking as the lava is rising. So you'd better hurry up and reach the upper parts of the parkour before it's too late! Jump, climb and beat the heat in Obby Parkour Lava! Whether you're a fan of Roblox or just love parkour games, Obby: Parkour Lava will keep you hooked from start to finish!What Are Roblox Games?Roblox games are player-created experiences within the Roblox platform, offering a wide range of genres such as parkour, racing, simulations, and adventure. These games often encourage creativity and social interaction, allowing players to explore, build, and customize their worlds. Similar to Roblox's "Floor is Lava" mode, Obby: Parkour Lava brings the same energetic and fast-paced challenges right to your fingertips. If you enjoy Roblox, you'll find this game a familiar and fun experience.ControlsOn Computers:Move: WASDJump: SpacebarCamera: Mouse movementPause: EscOn Mobile Devices:Use the on-screen joystick to move your character.Swipe on the screen to adjust the camera for better navigation.How to Play Obby: Parkour LavaRun, jump and climb with precision to reach the checkpoints because lava is rising.If you fall into the lava, you need to start from the last checkpoint.Use WASD to move and spacebar to jump. Your goal is to collect coins scattered across the platforms.You can use your earnings to unlock skins in the shop and show off your style.A few of the available skins are Robbie, Stickman, Doge and Rainbow Friend.Features of Obby: Parkour LavaParkour Challenges: Jump, climb, and race your way to the top before the lava consumes everything.Massive Map: Explore a sprawling map filled with tricky platforms and hidden coins.Roblox-Inspired Design: Fans of Roblox will appreciate the familiar aesthetic and gameplay elements.DeveloperMakhonin created Obby Parkour Lava.More Free GamesIf Obby: Parkour Lava is your jam, you'll love exploring other exciting parkour games like Only Up Obby. Dive into the world of blocky guys and the creativity that online Roblox games bring to your screen!This article was updated on December 26, 20243DActionArcadeCrazyFreeMobileMultiplayerParkourPhysicsRacingRobloxRunning
